description: Manage IP configurations of a network interface.

commands.name: az network nic ip-config create
commands.syntax:
az network nic ip-config create --name
                                --nic-name
                                --resource-group
                                [--ag-address-pools]
                                [--application-security-groups]
                                [--gateway-name]
                                [--lb-address-pools]
                                [--lb-inbound-nat-rules]
                                [--lb-name]
                                [--make-primary {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                [--private-ip-address]
                                [--private-ip-address-version {IPv4, IPv6}]
                                [--public-ip-address]
                                [--subnet]
                                [--vnet-name]
examples: az network nic ip-config create -g MyResourceGroup -n MyIpConfig --nic-name MyNic --make-primary

commands.name: az network nic ip-config delete
commands.syntax:
az network nic ip-config delete --name
                                --nic-name
                                --resource-group
                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network nic ip-config delete -g MyResourceGroup -n MyIpConfig --nic-name MyNic

commands.name: az network nic ip-config list
commands.summary: List the IP configurations of an NIC.
examples: az network nic ip-config list -g MyResourceGroup --nic-name MyNic

commands.name: az network nic ip-config show
commands.summary: Show the details of an IP configuration.
examples: az network nic ip-config show -g MyResourceGroup -n MyIpConfig --nic-name MyNic

commands.name: az network nic ip-config update
commands.syntax:
az network nic ip-config update --name
                                --nic-name
                                --resource-group
                                [--add]
                                [--ag-address-pools]
                                [--application-security-groups]
                                [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                [--gateway-lb]
                                [--gateway-name]
                                [--lb-address-pools]
                                [--lb-inbound-nat-rules]
                                [--lb-name]
                                [--make-primary {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                [--private-ip-address]
                                [--private-ip-address-version {IPv4, IPv6}]
                                [--public-ip-address]
                                [--remove]
                                [--set]
                                [--subnet]
                                [--vnet-name]
examples: az network nic ip-config update -g MyResourceGroup --nic-name MyNic -n MyIpConfig --private-ip-address 10.0.0.9
az network nic ip-config update -g MyResourceGroup --nic-name MyNic -n MyIpConfig --make-primary

commands.name: az network nic ip-config wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
